title: Equity Bank Wings to Fly Scholarship
description: Full secondary school scholarship for high-performing students from needy backgrounds.

title: Safaricom Internship Program
description: 3-month internship program for university students in IT, business, and engineering.

title: Ajira Digital Training Bootcamp
description: Free online training to help youth access online jobs.

title: KenGen Graduate Trainee Program
description: 12-month graduate program for engineering and IT graduates. Includes training and placement.

title: Google Africa Developer Scholarship
description: Access free Google-backed training in Android, Web, and Cloud technologies.

title: UNICEF Youth Innovation Challenge
description: Submit your tech ideas solving youth-related problems for a chance to win funding and mentorship.

title: PwC Graduate Recruitment
description: Full-time graduate roles in accounting, IT, and consulting for top university graduates.

title: eMobilis Software Development Scholarship
description: Free scholarship for mobile/web development training at eMobilis, Nairobi.

title: Andela Technical Leadership Program
description: An intensive remote training program for aspiring software engineers in Africa.

title: ICT Authority Internship Program
description: 6-month government internship in ICT-related departments, open to recent graduates.
